document_data.mainbody:
parandar Gate was the southernmost gate into the city of Athkatla in Amn.
Athkatlas Grave District was the southernmost part of Athkatla, walled from the main city and separated from it by the Cold Dolor Gate. Sparandar Gate, in turn, was the only entrance into the Grave District from outside of Athkatla.
All non-citizens who passed Cold Dolor Gate had to pay an "any one coin" toll, of gold or silver, to be allowed into the main body of Athkatla, however, passage through Sparandar Gate was unrestricted by such means, allowing guests access to the city cemetery.
